title: Configurable Message on Scoreboard
custom_preconds: Given the user is on an Android handset
custom_steps:
When a user is on the Scoreboard
and the "MLB PLUS Game of the Day" is available on that day
custom_expected: Then the "MLB PLUS Game of the Day" text is displayed the same as existing "MLB.TV Game of the Day"

title: Configurable Message on MLB.TV EPG
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an Android device
custom_steps:
When a user is on the MLB.TV EPG
and an "MLB PLUS Game of the Day" is available

custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the "MLB PLUS Game of the Day" text is displayed the same as existing "MLB.TV Game of the Day"
Then the "MLB PLUS Game of the Day" text is displayed the same as existing "MLB.TV Game of the Day"

title: MLB.TV EPG Button
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an Android device

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user is on the MLB.TV EPG
and taps on the game that is the "MLB PLUS Game of the Day"
and the game feeds are available
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then there will be three feed buttons available
(Away, Home, MLB PLUS)

Then the MLB PLUS button should not display the TV call signs
and it should display MLB PLUS

Then the MLB PLUS button should not display the TV call signs
and it should display MLB PLUS

title: No Access for Lite Users
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on an Android device
(Handset and Tablet)
custom_steps:
When a user is a Lite user
and attempts to access the "MLB PLUS Game of the Day" feeds

(Try different entry points)

custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be see the At Bat Premium Paywall
Then the user will be see the At Bat Premium Paywall
Then the user will be see the At Bat Premium Paywall

title: No Access for Single Team Users
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on an Android device
(Handset and Tablet)
custom_steps:
When a user is logged in with a single team entitled account
and attempts to access the "MLB PLUS Game of the Day" feeds

(Try different entry points)

custom_steps_separated.content:
Home team's feed
(if Single team account is NOT entitled for the home team)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see the Single Team message: "You need an active MLB.TV subscription to view this game. MLB.TV Single Team subscribers, select your team's broadcast..."

custom_steps_separated.content:
Home team's feed
(if Single team account IS entitled for the home team)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the home team's feed will begin

custom_steps_separated.content:
Away team's feed
(if Single team account is NOT entitled for the away team)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see the Single Team message: "You need an active MLB.TV subscription to view this game. MLB.TV Single Team subscribers, select your team's broadcast..."

custom_steps_separated.content:
Away team's feed
(if Single team account IS entitled for the away team)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the away team's feed will begin
Then the user will see the Single Team message: "You need an active MLB.TV subscription to view this game. MLB.TV Single Team subscribers, select your team's broadcast..."

title: Access for At Bat and TV Premium Users
custom_preconds:
Given a user is on an Android device
(Handset and Tablet)
custom_steps:
When a user is logged in with an At Bat or TV Premium account
and attempts to access the "MLB PLUS Game of the Day" feeds

custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the home team's feed will begin
Then the away team's feed will begin
Then the MLB PLUS feed will begin

title: Local (In-market) Blackout
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an Android device
custom_steps:
When a Premium user taps on the LIVE MLB PLUS Game of the Day feeds
and a local (in-market) team is playing

custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will receive a Blackout Message
Then the user will receive a Blackout Message

title: Executive Account
custom_preconds: Given a user is on an Android device
custom_steps:
When a user is logged in with an executive account
and there is a LIVE MLB PLUS game
and the user taps on the MLB PLUS feed button
and the game feed is local (in-market) team

custom_steps_separated.expected:
then the feed will launch
and no Blackout message

then the feed will launch
and no Blackout message
